org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types

Class MacAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<MacAddress>, OFValueType<MacAddress>, PrimitiveSinkable

    public class MacAddress
extends Object
implements OFValueType<MacAddress>
    Wrapper around a 6 byte mac address.
    Author:
    Andreas Wundsam <andreas.wundsam@bigswitch.com>

      • of

      • of

        public static MacAddress of(long raw)

      • of

        @Nonnull
public static MacAddress of(@Nonnull
                                     String macString)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parse a mac adress from a string representation as 6 hex bytes separated by colons or hyphens (01:02:03:04:05:06, 01-02-03-04-05-06).
        Parameters:
        macString - - a mac address in string representation
        Returns:
        the parsed MacAddress
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if macString is not a valid mac adddress

      • of

        public static MacAddress of(@Nonnull
                            DatapathId dpid)
        Creates a MacAddress from a DatapathId. This factory method assumes that the first two bytes of the DatapathId are 0 bytes.
        Parameters:
        dpid - the DatapathId to create the MacAddress from
        Returns:
        a MacAddress derived from the supplied DatapathId

      • forIPv6MulticastAddr

        @Nonnull
public static MacAddress forIPv6MulticastAddr(IPv6Address ipv6)
                                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Generate a MAC address corresponding to multicast IPv6 address. Take the last 4 bytes of IPv6 address and copy them to the base IPv6 multicast mac address - 33:33:00:00:00:00.
        Parameters:
        ipv6 - - IPv6 address corresponding to which multicast MAC addr need to be generated.
        Returns:
        - the generated multicast mac address.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if ipv6 address is not a valid IPv6 multicast address.
